reason: Well-structured answer covering 자율연수휴직 신청 절차, 요건, 기간, 서류. All facts verified against pages 146-147: 법적근거(교육공무원법 제44조제1항제12호), 대상(10년 이상), 기간(1년 이내), 횟수(1회) all match source.
Specific question about eligibility for 자율연수휴직. Answer correctly identifies 재직기간 10년 이상 교원 requirement, 임용권자 구분(교사/교감:교육장, 교장:교육감), 교원인사자문위원회 의견 청취 등 all verified against page 146.
Raw dump with broken table formatting. Answer contains pipe characters from source table ('교(원)장 : 도교육청 | | 교사, 교(원)감 : 교육장') not properly reformatted. Poorly structured presentation.
Vague/ambiguous question - '1번째 항목' does not specify which list or section. Answer dumps 유의사항 content (다) section) which is not clearly the '1st item'. Question-answer mismatch.

Source mismatch - answer mixes content from PREVIOUS 휴직 type (top of p.146: 경력평정 100% 산입, 호봉승급 100% 산입) with 자율연수휴직. The correct 자율연수휴직 경력인정 is on p.147 (미산입). Misleading conflation of two different leave types.
Question asks about 휴직사유 기준 but answer dumps previous section's 기타 content (경력평정 100% 산입) instead of the actual 휴직사유 (자기개발 학습·연구, 신체적·정신적 회복). Does not answer the question asked.

Source mismatch - answer presents previous leave type's 경력인정 data (100% 산입) under 자율연수휴직 context. The actual 자율연수휴직 경력인정 on p.147 is 미산입. Confusingly mixes two different 휴직 types' career recognition data.

Raw dump of mixed sections from page 146. Question asks about legal provisions for 휴직의 요건 but answer dumps 기타/복직/경력인정 content from previous section instead of addressing the actual 요건 (대상, 절차, 유의사항). Does not answer the question.
Bad question - '휴직기간 및 횟수의 사유' is nonsensical. Period/frequency (기간/횟수) do not have '사유' (reasons). The question confuses section title with a concept that can have reasons.
Duplicate answer - substantively identical to q_3_0690 (same source dump of page 147 휴직기간 및 횟수 section with only intro sentence differing). Near-verbatim duplicate content.
